name: Bac Ninh - An Ancient Culture in Northern Vietnam* A Fundraising Tour*
description:
I will take you to a famous cultural center in Northern Vietnam - Bac Ninh province. You will have chance to learn typical pagoda architecture in the Ly dynasty of Vietnam and enjoy some local traditional dishes. 
What special about this trip is that all the money will be used to raising fund for my community library project that aims to encourage the love for books through the provision of free qualified-books for  children in rural areas. Some other activities include organizing free English classes, group discussion to introduce critical thinking skill, music club, and others activities... 
Detailed information about the project can be found at:
http://thuviencongdong.webmienphi.in/

8:00 AM: Leaving Hanoi
9:00 AM: Arriving at Bac Ninh
